casebody.data:
COPP, Respondent, v. COLORADO COAL & IRON CO., Appellant. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

June 29, 1899.) Action by William A. Copp against the Colorado Coal & Iron Company. From a judgment for plaintiff, and an order denying a new trial, defendant appeals. Affirmed. PER CURIAM.

Judgment entered on a verdict directed by the court, and order denying a motion for a new trial, appealed from, are affirmed, with costs and disbursements.
